<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Populate icon names for CI types to be used by CMDB Unified Node components</description> <name>Populate icon names for CI types</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { if (pm.isZboot()) return;
//check if the column exists var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary'); gr.addQuery('name', 'ngbsm_ci_type_icon'); gr.addQuery('element', 'icon_name'); gr.query(); if(!gr.next()){ return; } //mapping for ngbsm_ci_type_icon record sys_id -> new icon name var map = { '0b96fe519fa20200ee6219eb552e7048':'tree-workflow-outline', '0b96fe519fa20200ee6219eb552e7049':'serverbox-outline', '0f96fe519fa20200ee6219eb552e7048':'globe-outline', '0f96fe519fa20200ee6219eb552e704a':'serverbox-outline', '15d36892c32122003263bea192d3ae0e':'inventory-outline', 'fc07357193100200e4e4705bb47ffb72':'database-outline', 'fc07357193100200e4e4705bb47ffb77':'database-outline', 'fc742dd69fb00200eb3919eb552e7087':'tree-workflow-outline', 'fc742dd69fb00200eb3919eb552e7090':'sync-outline', 'fc742dd69fb00200eb3919eb552e7092':'globe-outline', 'fd64ac92c32122003263bea192d3aedf':'tag-outline', 'fe96fe519fa20200ee6219eb552e7045':'serverbox-outline' };
for (var key in map) { var gr = new GlideRecord('ngbsm_ci_type_icon'); gr.addQuery('sys_id', key); gr.query(); if(gr.next()){ gr.setValue('icon_name', map[key]); gr.update(); } } })()]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-12-14 23:57:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>27b8ccd553f351108cabddeeff7b12ff</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Populate icon names for CI types</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Next-Gen BSM" source="com.snc.ng_bsm">f3a6bc643cb1311068bcf327dfe37fac</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_27b8ccd553f351108cabddeeff7b12ff</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-12-15 19:03:54</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
